summary: Completed comprehensive testing of QA Task Manager with Kanban board functionality. Fixed critical CORS issue and verified all core features. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend navigation and UI components working correctly with minor session persistence issue affecting drag & drop testing.

resolved_issues.impact: Frontend could not communicate with backend
resolved_issues.status: Fixed by correcting REACT_APP_API_URL configuration in frontend/.env

minor_ui_issues.issue: Session persistence issue when navigating directly to /tasks URL
minor_ui_issues.details: Users get redirected to login when accessing /tasks directly, but navigation through UI works correctly

integration_issues.issue: Could not complete drag & drop testing due to session persistence issue
integration_issues.details: Kanban board structure is correct with all 4 columns, but session issues prevented full drag & drop verification

passed_tests: User registration with device-based authentication (100% success)
All 25 backend API endpoints working correctly
Kanban board structure - All 4 columns visible (Yapılacak, Devam Ediyor, Bloke, Tamamlandı)
Task creation dialog with all form fields
Calendar page with full calendar grid component
Calendar daily summary showing task counts by status
Dashboard page with greeting and focus sections
Settings page with user profile and category management
Default categories setup (API Testi, UI Testi, Regresyon, Bug Tracking, Test Dokümantasyonu)
action_item_for_main_agent: 1) Fix session persistence issue for direct URL navigation to /tasks page, 2) Complete drag & drop functionality testing once session issue is resolved, 3) Consider adding session timeout handling or better authentication state management
